page.title: 14Children and Money
page.content: For my pocket money I get 90p per week. I get 40p from my one nan and 50p from the other. I like to spend my money on things such as sweets, ice cream, comics or even something for school like a rubber, ruler or pencil sharpener. At the moment though I am saving my money because I want to spend it all when I go on my holiday to Cornwall. A pund is 100p and it does not really buy much. Some sweets are cheap like a penny or two pence but most are about 15 pence each. Anyway my mum says my teeth will drop out if I eat too many sweets! Some people ahve a lot of money in the bank. I would like that too but I would want to spend it.Things are going up in price all the time so I think it is better to spend your money than keep it in a bank.
